General.Name: IGG Inc
General.Description: IGG Inc, an investment holding company, develops and operates mobile and online games in Asia, North America, Europe, and internationally. It offers mobile, browser, PC, and client-based online games in 23 languages. It also licenses online games; and provides customer support and technical support services. IGG Inc was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Singapore.
